Each day brings its responsibilities and duties, but the work of tomorrow must not be crowded into the 
                                                                           245
hours of today. God is merciful, full of compassion, reasonable in His requirements. He does not ask us to pursue a course of action that will result in the loss of physical health or the enfeebling of the mental powers. He would not have us work under a pressure and strain until exhaustion follows, with prostration of the nerves.
